data.actual_result: The server icon begins playing back the gif loop. Upon applying however, the image becomes static.
data.expected_result: The server icon should stay static, and no playback should occur.
data.short_description: Pasting gifs into server icon selection shows gif playback on preview.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open server settings and go to the Overview tab - Select the image to upload a new one - Instead of uploading png, upload a gif - Select OK, and observe
